articles.author: Aviral Shukla
articles.title: Ajit Agarkar responds to queries regarding resting Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli for the first two ODIs against Australia - Cricket Times
articles.description: India will take on Australia in the first ODI of the 3-match series on September 22. KL Rahul will lead the Indian side in the absence of Rohit Sharma.
articles.content:
Following their impressive victory in the Asia Cup 2023, the Indian cricket team is poised for an exciting showdown against Australia in a three-match ODI series on their home turf.
